meanings.definition: Not practiced or prepared in advance.
meanings.sent1: The actors gave an unrehearsed performance that felt fresh and spontaneous.
meanings.sent2: The speech sounded unrehearsed, but it was actually well thought out.
meanings.sent3: The unrehearsed dance moves made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unrehearsed reaction to the surprise was priceless.
meanings.sent5: The unrehearsed singing filled the room with raw emotion.

meanings.definition: Done without prior planning or preparation.
meanings.sent1: The magician's unrehearsed trick went wrong in front of the audience.
meanings.sent2: The impromptu decision felt unrehearsed but turned out to be successful.
meanings.sent3: His unrehearsed attempt at cooking ended in a disaster.
meanings.sent4: The unrehearsed meeting led to unexpected outcomes.
meanings.sent5: The unrehearsed party turned into a memorable night of fun.
